39 -class EncodingDetectFilter(_filters.BaseEventFilter): 

40      """ Extract template encoding and pass it properly to the builder """ 
41   
42      #: Regex matcher to match encoding declarations 
43      #: 
44      #: :Type: ``callable`` 
45      _PI_MATCH = _re.compile(r''' 
46          \[\? \s* 
47          [eE][nN][cC][oO][dD][iI][nN][gG] (?:\s+|\s*=\s*) (?P<enc>[^=\s?]+) 
48          \s* \?\]$ 
49      ''', _re.X).match 
50   

51 -    def handle_pi(self, data): 

52          """ 
53          Extract encoding from PI instruction 
54   
55          Here's a sample for the expected format:: 
56   
57            [? encoding latin-1 ?] 
58   
59          The event is passed to the builder nevertheless. 
60   
61          :See: `BuildingListenerInterface` 
62          """ 
63          match = self._PI_MATCH(data) 
64          if match: 
65              self.builder.handle_encoding(match.group('enc')) 
66          self.builder.handle_pi(data)
